item.title: How To: Create a Test OMOP Dataset in R
item.description: Introduction The use of electronic health record (EHR) data is common and often necessary in clinical research. These data can be cumbersome and complicated, yet inaccessible due to privacy laws. My goal in this post is to set the reader up with a “fake” clinical dataset so that they can learn the ins and out of EHR data and feel more prepared when they encounter the real thing.
